abstract: The chief wine critic of The Times will review the weekly restaurant reviews until the paper names a permanent critic.
snippet: The chief wine critic of The Times will review the weekly restaurant reviews until the paper names a permanent critic.
lead_paragraph: While we wait for the puffs of white smoke that will issue from the chimney atop 620 Eighth Avenue when The Times names its next restaurant critic, the weekly reviews will be written by Eric Asimov. This week he takes on Salinas, in Chelsea, which is worth two stars in his book.

headline.main: Eric Asimov Is the Interim Restaurant Critic
